title: Alibaba and Tencent Stocks Are Diverging. Here’s Which One to Buy, According to an Analyst.
text:
Alibaba Group (ticker: BABA) and Tencent Holdings (700.Hong Kong) are often used as proxies by those looking to invest in China, but the outlooks for the two internet companies differ, with Bernstein analyst David Dai raising his price target on the e-commerce giant and cutting his price target on the gaming and social media powerhouse, even as he said both are worthy of investors’ attention.

Amid concerns about China’s economic slowdown, the impact of the trade war, and the protests in Hong Kong, internet companies have...
description: Alibaba and Tencent are often used as proxies by those looking to invest in China, but the outlooks for the two internet companies differ, Bernstein says.
